text:
@WhiteHouse WH left out the States that are experiencing up-tick 
 including in Tulsa, Oklahoma.  Many hospitals close to capacity of Covid-19 patients.  More people presenting daily.  DJT ignoring those who die of Covid daily. As of today 22,482. INTOLERABLE
